casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sethy Tony SEAM. No. 82A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 12, 2014. Charles H. Harp, II, Attorney at Law, Lexington, for Seam, Sethy Tony. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Seam, Sethy Tony. Staples S. Hughes, Appellate Defender. Gary W. Frank, District Attorney.

Opinion

The following Order was entered:Pursuant to N.C.G.S. 7A-31(a) and (b)(2) and Rule 15(e)(2) of the North Carolina Rules of Appellate Procedure, the Court on its own initiative hereby certifies for review prior to determination in the Court of Appeals State v. Sethy Tony Seam, COA13-1066. The case shall be docketed in this Court as of the date of this order. Briefs of the respective parties that have been submitted to the Court of Appeals shall be considered by this Court.
